label: Raffle
prizes: Five lucky participants will receive free merch bundles from our sponsors, Figma and Notion, as well as Adobe. All participants who submit a working prototype according to the submission requirement and prompt AND complete at least 1 entry are eligible to win. See below for ways to enter.
• Participate in our #just-for-fun Discord challenge = 1 entry
• Attend a social = 1 entry
• Attend a workshop = 1 entry
